ComicInfo.Summary: When Wakes the War-Beast!: The Fury protects cargo going to L.A.S.E.R. for Commander Sky Solo from aerial thieves. His pursuit is interrupted by an attack by the Voidoid. Fury's battle with Voidoid is about to end when Cargo X, a super-evolved dinosaur with mental powers, attacks them both. With the help of Commander Solo, Fury is able to stop Cargo X, but Voidoid escapes.
ComicInfo.Tags: Infra-Girl,Warbeast,United Nations Headquarters,The Voidoid,Infra-Man,New York City,The Fury,Sky Solo
ComicInfo.Title: When Wakes the War-Beast!
